title: Version control for Power BI files
excerpt: In this video I am going to show you how to do version control with Power BI files, or at least, one way to do it.   How do you do it? Let me know in the comments box.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power and Excel BI! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJ7UhloHSA4wAqPzyi6TOkw?sub_confirmation=1
